title: (x) BBC TopGear UK display typeface - Magistral {Geoff, Angel}
content:
This is BBC TopGear UK's display typeface. Please tell me which one. I need to purchase this font urgently...

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ferrari.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20101209155431/http:/typophile.com/files/ferrari.jpg) | 66.99 KB |
author: nirmalbiswas

comments.content:
The central text is Magistral Black or Extra Bold.

[http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/paratype/magistral\_extra\_bold\_ot/](http://web.archive.org/web/20101209155431/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/paratype/magistral_extra_bold_ot/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/paratype/magistral\_extra\_bold\_ot/")

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/magistral/](http://web.archive.org/web/20101209155431/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/magistral/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/magistral/")
I knew I shouldn't have put in that extra link!
